column6:
Watch out, you latté-sipping, bookmark-bending, literary snob! Spider-Man and the Vulture are bringing a whole new meaning to the term "Battle of the Books" as they duke it out in a bookstore! And stuck right in the middle, dodging hardcovers, is poor Deborah Whitman, author of a memoir detailing her tumultuous relationship with Peter Parker. Whoever invented that old saying about words not hurting as much as sticks and stones obviously hasn't lived a day in the webslinger's boots!,2006,12
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:John Dell | penciller (cover):Scot Eaton | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit
